answers.answer: I was dealing with similar things I've stopped the asprin and my baby is perfectly healthy talk to ur doctor just to b sure though :)
I agree. Ask your doctor before you stop anything, just to be sure :)
Definetly ask before u stop any medicine. I am also on baby asptun cuz  I'm at high risk for preeclampsia I'm 27 weeks but he just put me on it.
It totally slipped my mind when I was there last week. Lol ill stay on it til my next appointment at least. I just dont want to have excessive bleeding during labor due to my blood being thinned.
I agree..I'm starting to worry about that too! I just keep telling myself my Dr knows best right? Lol this is is my third pregnancy and everything is new this time its crazy!
Ive spoke to my doc about all this he said it doesnt work that way ive gotta take mine until the end of my pregnancy its perfectly safe :) xx

question: My dr suggested at my first prenatal appointment that I take a low dose asprin everyday for blood circulation. Because of my history of miscarriage. She thought it would be benificial in early pregnancy. Between the progesterone, prenatals, vitamin d, dha, asprin and calcium suppliments. Something worked. My 27 weeks now and I'm wondering if I should stop the asprin regamin now?
title: low dose asprin regamin?
